document.full_text: connecticut's kemba walker said the school's decision to put his name and number on the wall of its basketball arena helped him decide it was time to head to the nba.
document.title: uconn's kemba walker to enter n.b.a. draft
lines_and_colors: connecticut's kemba walker said the school's decision to put his name and number on the wall of its basketball arena helped him decide it was time to head to the nba.
